Package edu.northwestern.at.utils.xml

Reusable XML utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ElementProcessor Interface for JDOM element processor.
 

Class Summary
DOMUtils XML DOM utilities.
ExtendedXMLFilterImpl Extended XMLFilterImpl with some utility methods.
IndentingXMLWriter XMLWriter which indents the output before each tag.
JDOMUtils XML JDOM utilities.
SchemaUtils XML Schema utilities.
TEITagClassifier XML tag classifier for TEI XML.
TEITextExtractorHandler SAX event handler to extract text from a TEI XML file.
XMLTagClassifier XML tag classifier.
XMLTextReplacer Applies pattern replacements to XML text.
XMLUtils XML utilities.
